item.content:encoded:
didn't see the hanafuda decks in the PH tab. don't see the badger in the item list (not sure where that would go, maybe PH as PH items are needed- steel mahjong set, lycoral hanafuda deck. but maybe kaiju as 4 drops are needed for their quests.), then the pocket watches aren't on the crafting page. (i'd set it on an upgrade order starting with the Crushed Pocketwatch and going from there.)

would edit myself but don't know how to really do that. i'll leave it to somebody that knows what they're doing.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
The page hasn't been updated as per the stamina/consumables re-balance as of February 8, 2011.

Super Potion: 60 App / +130 Stamina
Ultra Elixir: 40 App / +60 Stamina
Bitter Medicine: 40 App / +80 Stamina
Golden Potion: 100 App / +300 Stamina
Also:
Delicious Cake: 0 App / +111 Stamina (1/day)
Smokestacks: 20 App / +3 Smoke Bombs

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
New limited time one-use item given as a freebie because 11DBHK did well in Starcraft II and got placed into the Roach Whiskey League (a Silver League).

Roach Whiskey
+500 Stamina
-11,000,000 Daily Ranking
zero appetite cost

Supposedly it will not last for more than 7 days, so if nothing else there will be a record of the item here for posterity. :)

On use:

Roach Whiskey Used!
+500 Stamina, set Ranking XP to -11,000,000
Ugh, it tastes creepy (HA CREEPY GET IT)
